title: Teen Spends Years At Rikers Island Without Being Sentenced
teaser: Robert Siegel speaks to Jen Gonnerman about her New Yorker profile of Kalief Browder. He spent three years in jail awaiting trial, starting when he was 16 years old. His case was ultimately dismissed.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
